    • getCellValue

      public Object getCellValue(Object rowObject, int rowIndex, int columnIndex, GuiReprValue.ObjectSpecifier specifier)
      Overrides:
      getCellValue in class ObjectTableColumn
      Parameters:
      rowObject - the row object at rowIndex
      rowIndex - the row index
      columnIndex - the column index
      specifier - specifier from ObjectTableColumn.getSpecifier(int, int)
      Returns:
      the value at columnIndex of rowObject. it might be Future, and then the value will be specially treated as getting the value of the future as the cell value.
